roleDetails.title: Role details
roleDetails.description: A summary of the organizationâ€™s role in this procurement.

vcse.title: VCSE status
vcse.description: Whether an organization is a voluntary, community or social enterprise (VCSE). In the UK, a VCSE is defined as a non-governmental organization that is value-driven and principally reinvests its surpluses to further social, environmental or cultural objectives.

publicServiceMissionOrganization.title: Public service mission organization status
publicServiceMissionOrganization.description: Whether an organization is a public service mission organization. In the UK, public service mission organizations are called public service mutuals, and are defined as delivering reservable light touch public services, not for profit or distributing profits to members only, and employee-managed.

shelteredWorkshop.title: Sheltered workshop status
shelteredWorkshop.description: Whether an organization is a sheltered workshop. In the UK, sheltered workshops are called supported employment providers, and are defined as providing employment or related support to disabled or disadvantaged individuals, who are at least 30% of employees.

excludedSupplier.title: Excluded supplier information
excludedSupplier.description: Information about an excluded supplier being awarded a contract.

exclusionGrounds.title: Exclusion grounds
exclusionGrounds.description: The exclusion grounds that apply to the supplier or an associated person.

domesticLegalBasis.title: Domestic legal basis
domesticLegalBasis.description: Whether the legal basis for the exclusion grounds is UK-based.

awardRationale.title: Award rationale
awardRationale.description: The rationale for awarding the contract to the excluded supplier.

awardRationaleClassification.title: Award rationale classification
awardRationaleClassification.description: The classification of the rationale for awarding the contract to the excluded supplier.

control.title: Control
control.description: Information on other organizations or people that have a controlling interest in the organization.

description.title: Description
description.description: Textual description of who has what control over the organization.

noEngagementNoticeRationale.title: No engagement notice rationale
noEngagementNoticeRationale.description: The rationale for not publishing an engagement notice before the tender notice, if engagement has been carried out.

finalStatusDate.title: Final status date
finalStatusDate.description: The date on which the tender reached its final status.

procurementMethodRationaleLegalBasis.title: Procurement method rationale legal basis
procurementMethodRationaleLegalBasis.description: The legal basis of the rationale for the chosen procurement method. Specifically the UK statutory instrument that allows the direct award with the justification to protect life, health, public order or safety.

specialRegime.title: Special regime
specialRegime.description: The special regime that the tender is under.

aboveThreshold.title: Above threshold
aboveThreshold.description: Whether the tender value is above the relevant threshold.

lotDetails.title: Lot Details
lotDetails.description: Details of any criteria that apply to bidding on the lots in this tender.

maximumLotsBidPerSupplier.title: Maximum lots per supplier
maximumLotsBidPerSupplier.description: The maximum number of lots that one supplier can bid on as part of this contracting process.

maximumLotsAwardedPerSupplier.title: Maximum lots per supplier
maximumLotsAwardedPerSupplier.description: The maximum number of lots that can be awarded to one supplier as part of this contracting process.

awardCriteriaDetails.title: Award criteria details
awardCriteriaDetails.description: Any detailed or further information on the award or selection criteria.

noLotsDivisionRationale.title: No lots division rationale
noLotsDivisionRationale.description: The rationale for not dividing the tender into lots, if that would have been possible.

expressionOfInterestDeadline.title: Expression of interest deadline
expressionOfInterestDeadline.description: The submission deadline for expressions of interest. This submission is also called a request to participate.

riskDetails.title: Risk details
riskDetails.description: Description of risks that could jeopardise the satisfactory performance of the contract.

standstillPeriod.title: Standstill period
standstillPeriod.description: The period before the contract signature during which the award decision can be challenged. This period typically starts on the date on which the tenderers are informed about the award decision.

finalStatusDate.title: Final status date
finalStatusDate.description: The date on which the award reached its final status.

assessmentSummariesDateSent.title: Assessment summaries date sent
assessmentSummariesDateSent.description: The date on which assessment summaries were sent to tenderers.

aboveThreshold.title: Above threshold
aboveThreshold.description: Whether the award value is above the relevant threshold.

mainProcurementCategory.title: Main procurement category
mainProcurementCategory.description: The primary category describing the main object of this award, from the closed [procurementCategory](https://standard.open-contracting.org/{{version}}/{{lang}}/schema/codelists/#procurement-category) codelist.

additionalProcurementCategories.title: Additional procurement categories
additionalProcurementCategories.description: Any additional categories describing the objects of this award, using the open [extendedProcurementCategory](https://standard.open-contracting.org/{{version}}/{{lang}}/schema/codelists/#extended-procurement-category) codelist.

aboveThreshold.title: Above threshold
aboveThreshold.description: Whether the contract value is above the relevant threshold.

terminationRationaleClassification.title: Termination rationale classification
terminationRationaleClassification.description: The classification of the rationale for terminating the contract.

noAgreedMetricsRationale.title: No agreed metrics rationale
noAgreedMetricsRationale.description: The rationale for not publishing agreed metrics, in the UK known as key performance indicators.

proposedAmendments.title: Proposed amendments
proposedAmendments.description: Amendments that have been proposed but at this point have not been signed.

standstill.title: Standstill
standstill.description: Whether the period between the publication of this notice and the estimated contract amendment date constitute a formal standstill period.

rationaleClassifications.title: Rationale classifications
rationaleClassifications.description: The classifications of the rationale for amending the contract.

period.title: Period
period.description: The period for which the amended contract will be in force.

hasRenewal.title: Has renewal
hasRenewal.description: Whether the buyer reserves the right to renew the contract.

value.title: Value
value.description: The total value of the amended contract.

aboveThreshold.title: Above threshold
aboveThreshold.description: Whether the amended contract value is above the relevant threshold.

suppliersAdded.title: Suppliers added
suppliersAdded.description: The suppliers that will be added to the amended contract when it is signed.

suppliersRemoved.title: Suppliers added
suppliersRemoved.description: The suppliers that will be removed from the amended contract when it is signed.

noticeType.title: Notice type
noticeType.description: The notice type published, more specific than the OCDS document type.

durationInMonths.title: Duration in months
durationInMonths.description: The maximum duration of this period in months.

description.title: Description
description.description: An overall description of all award criteria.

futureNoticeRecipients.title: Future notice recipients
futureNoticeRecipients.description: Who the next sequential notice will be provided to, if not published.

isOpenFrameworkScheme.title: Is open framework scheme
isOpenFrameworkScheme.description: Whether the framework agreement is an open framework. In the UK, an open framework is a series of frameworks with substantially the same terms. Awarded suppliers are carried over and new suppliers can bid.

openFrameworkSchemeEndDate.title: Open framework scheme end date
openFrameworkSchemeEndDate.description: The date on which the final framework agreement in the open framework ends.

type.title: Type
type.description: Whether the framework agreement can be used by buyers not listed in the contracting process.

buyerClassificationRestrictions.title: Buyer classification restrictions
buyerClassificationRestrictions.description: The classifications of buyers who can use the framework agreement. In the UK, used if only utilities can use a dynamic market.

buyerLocationRestrictions.title: Buyer location restrictions
buyerLocationRestrictions.description: Restrictions on the location of buyer who can use the framework agreement.

reservedParticipationLocation.title: Reserved participation location
reservedParticipationLocation.description: The location of organizations to which participation is reserved. In the UK, below-threshold contracts can be reserved for suppliers from a single county or London borough.

description.description: A description of the subcontract, including any subcontractor information only available as free text. In the UK, the associated people/organisations that the supplier will subcontract to or is relying on to satisfy the conditions of participation.

vcse.title: VCSE
vcse.description: Whether the contracting process, lot or lot group is suitable for voluntary, community or social enterprises. In the UK, a VCSE is defined as a non-governmental organization that is value-driven and principally reinvests its surpluses to further social, environmental or cultural objectives.

AboveThreshold.title: Above threshold
AboveThreshold.description: Whether the tender, award or contract value is above the relevant threshold.
